pages.title: Whirligig
pages.text: The <item>Whirligig/$ is a handheld device that provides slowfall or elevation when used (by holding down right-click). It has to be wound in a <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/winding_table)Spring Winding Table/$, up to 10rad/s.$(br2)It provides better slowfall at higher <thing>$(l:essentials:rotary/winding_table)spring speeds/$, and will even lift the player upwards

when wound above 6rad/s.
